entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, West Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:09 a.m. PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.2Â°C

Observed at: West Vancouver 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
Temperature: 6.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h except 50 near the Strait of Georgia late this morning and this afternoon. Temperature steady near 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Showers this evening. Rain at times heavy beginning after midnight. Amount 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except southeast 50 near the Strait of Georgia this evening. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain at times heavy. High 10.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southeast 40 in the morning except 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and in the afternoon. High 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
